vista.gui

Class TableCellAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • vista.gui.TableCellAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public abstract class TableCellAction
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A class that listens to mouse clicks on a table's header and forwards them to an action
    Version:
    $Id: TableCellAction.java,v 1.2 2000/03/21 18:16:30 nsandhu Exp $
    Author:
    Nicky Sandhu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableCellAction(javax.swing.JTable table)
      an action to be taken when a cell in the table is clicked
      TableCellAction(javax.swing.JTable table, int mouseEventType)
      an action to be taken when a cell in the table gets the desired type of mouse event
